response.overview: Brand-new 4K restorations from the original 16mm prints of The Gumby Show. Includes:  "Mirror Land": Gumby loses his coin on the way to the shop and must venture through a series mirrors to retrieve it.  "The Little Lost Pony": Gumby hears a News Bulletin about a lost pony on television and finds a new friend.  "The Eggs and Trixie": At school, Gumby learns about dinosaurs. Then he begins to daydream about having an adventure with a young dinosaur named Trixie. He agrees to protect the eggs for Trixie from danger.  "Gumby Business": Gumby and Pokey have some fun around Toyland.  "Toying Around": Gumby and Pokey play with various children's toys around them.  "Moon Trip": Gumby discovers a spaceship in a toy store and decides to visit the moon. Upon reaching the moon, his spaceship is destroyed by a meteorite, leaving him stranded and confronted with strange objects that look like rocks, but which sometimes move and sprout eyes.
response.tagline: If you've got a heart, then Gumby's a part of you!
response.title: GUMBY (4K RESTORATION)
